seniority_level.evidence: 3+ years experience required, title is 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' without senior/junior qualifier, typical mid-level range for data engineering roles

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence', core responsibilities focus on BI, reporting, visualization using Cognos, and data warehouse projects

sub_specialty.evidence: Primary focus on business intelligence, reporting, visualization using Cognos, and BI/DW projects rather than general data engineering or ML

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, direct reports, or management responsibilities - purely individual contributor role focused on development and maintenance

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple cloud platforms mentioned as nice-to-have: AWS, Google Cloud, Azure - no single primary cloud specified

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major cloud providers (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure) mentioned as preferred experience, indicating multi-cloud environment

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on reporting, visualization, and BI projects suggests batch processing for scheduled reports and dashboards rather than real-time streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned - only ETL tools like DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica PowerCenter listed as nice-to-have

storage_layer.evidence: BI and data warehouse projects mentioned, Cognos reporting suggests structured data warehouse environment rather than data lake

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as 'Pune, Maharashtra, India' with onsite work model, indicating India-only restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to Pune, India suggests India timezone focus, no mention of global or multi-timezone teams

relocation_required.evidence: Must already be located in Pune, Maharashtra, India - no relocation mentioned, role is location-specific

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, location is India-specific which suggests local hiring only, no international visa support indicated

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, location-specific role in India suggests local work authorization requirements

citizenship_required.evidence: Role requires work authorization but no specific citizenship requirements mentioned, standard employment practice for India-based roles

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time position at IBM Consulting suggests traditional employment (W2) rather than contractor arrangement

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression, advancement, or growth path mentioned in the job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship program, working with senior staff, or learning opportunities mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, paths, or advancement opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between required skills (Cognos, BI, UNIX, English) and nice-to-have (cloud platforms, ETL tools), balanced approach

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined role focused specifically on Business Intelligence and Cognos development, single clear responsibility area

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements are reasonable for mid-level BI engineer role - 3 years experience aligns with skill requirements, no unrealistic expectations
